item.title: About
item.description: My name is Kerin Pithawala. I am a final year undegraduate student at Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies. I am persuing Bachelor of Technology(Honors) in Computer Engineering with minors in IoT, Cloud Computing and Blockchain. I am interested in software development and research.
